verses.name: Hosea 12:4
verses.text: Yea, he had power over the angel, and prevailed: he wept, and made supplication unto him: he found him in Beth–el, and there he spake with us;

verses.name: Hosea 12:5
verses.text: Even the Lord God of hosts; the Lord is his memorial.

verses.name: Hosea 12:6
verses.text: Therefore turn thou to thy God: keep mercy and judgment, and wait on thy God continually.

verses.name: Hosea 12:7
verses.text: He is a merchant, the balances of deceit are in his hand: he loveth to oppress.

verses.name: Hosea 12:8
verses.text: And Ephraim said, Yet I am become rich, I have found me out substance: in all my labours they shall find none iniquity in me that were sin.
